GET /api.description: serves a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/entertainers.description: serves up an array of all entertainers

exampleResponse.description: A master of balance and coordination, this juggler dazzles audiences with a variety of props including balls, clubs, and rings. Known for their high-energy performances and humorous interactions, they bring a playful and captivating experience to any event

GET /api/entertainers/:user_id.description: serves an entertainer object based on specified user_id

exampleResponse.description: A highly skilled violinist with years of experience, Emma delivers soulful and captivating performances. Perfect for weddings, events, and private concerts.

GET /api/locations.description: serves an array of location objects

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of location objects

POST /api/bookings.description: posts a new booking and returns it

GET /api/bookings/:booking_id.description: serves an bookings object based on specified booking_id

PATCH /api/entertainers/:user_id.description: updates a entertainers information based on its user_id

patchObject.description: a respected English football manager and former player known for my calm demeanor, tactical acumen, and dedication to nurturing young talent.

exampleResponse.description: a respected English football manager and former player known for my calm demeanor, tactical acumen, and dedication to nurturing young talent.

DELETE /api/entertainers/:user_id.description: deletes an entertainer based on its user_id

GET /api/availability/:entertainer_id.description: gets an entertainers availability when given its ID

PATCH /api/availability/:entertainer_id.description: updates the availabilty of an entertainer when given its ID
